text: The second season of Drag Race Thailand had a casting announcement on 4 March 2018. A casting commercial was shown on 13 September 2018, and stated any genders were allowed to apply, as well as non-Thai citizens. Art Arya and Pangina Heals remain as main judges for the season, and the show was still be aired on the Kantana Group. The season premiered on and ended on 5 April 2019. Beginning on 4 May 2020, the show began airing in America on WOWPresents Plus, with English subtitles. The winner was Angele Anang, with Kana Warrior and Kandy Zyanide finishing as the runners-up. Miss Congeniality was awarded to Maya B’Haro. Winner of the second season of Drag Race Thailand,Angele Anang. == Contestants == (Ages and names stated are correct at time of contest.) {|class="wikitable" border="2" style="text-align:center;font-size:96%" !
